alert.note: Alert for Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 12 at 2:57AM AKST until November 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast and Kivalina and Red Dog Dock. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves will push onshore, especially along south and west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night into Tuesday. Sustained south to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph late Sunday night through Monday night will shift to the northwest on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast
